rows.label: qst106020_msg0001
rows.name:
Now, let's get started on Hana's
modification right away, mo.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0002
rows.name:
Tora, I will prepare the
workshop, mo. In the meantime,
you gather the materials, mo.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0003
rows.name:
Got it, Dad, mo! Ah, Boss,
I need your help too, mo.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0004
rows.name: Of course we'll help!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0005
rows.name:
Necessary material is 10 Golden
Cog. Can be found by salvaging.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0006
rows.name: Then leave it to me.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0007
rows.name: Mo-mo! I can count on you, Boss, mo!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0008
rows.name:
It would be nice if Master were
a little more dependable, mo.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0009
rows.name: How cruel, mo!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0010
rows.name:
I've been thinking this for a while, but
Hana really knows how to dish out insults,
doesn't she... Is this also Tora's hobby?

rows.label: qst106020_msg0011
rows.name:
N-No, it's not, mo! Tora doesn't
have such a niche hobby, mo!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0012
rows.name:
It's a complete mystery how she
developed this personality, mo...

rows.label: qst106020_msg0013
rows.name:
I wish she'd learn some polite
behavior from Kiku, mo.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0014
rows.name: No, no, Kiku is even harsher, mo...

rows.label: qst106020_msg0015
rows.name:
When she's cleaning, she tries to
throw me out with the trash, mo.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0016
rows.name:
Masterpon, who is usually
indoors, is categorically
the same as trash, mo.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0017
rows.name:
See? See? She has a pretty
stern personality, mo.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0018
rows.name: They're sisters, alright...

rows.label: qst106020_msg0019
rows.name:
More importantly, please show
me my cute little sister's
powered-up form soon, mo.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0020
rows.name: Kiku can't wait any longer, mo.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0021
rows.name: Oh, that's right, that's right, mo.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0022
rows.name:
Tora, hurry up and get
the materials, mo.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0023
rows.name: Got it, mo!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0024
rows.name:
No matter how eager Master is, Rex
is the one doing the salvaging, mo.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0025
rows.name: So mean, mo!
